TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryServerFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
Public Class BinaryServerFormatterSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 提供使用 的伺服器格式子 (Formatter) 接收的實作。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 直到達到適當的格式器接收從伺服器傳輸接收到伺服器通道接收會傳播的要求資料流。The request stream propagates from the server transport sink through the server channel sinks until it reaches the appropriate formatter sink. 格式器接收訊息還原序列化，並透過管線傳遞。The formatter sink deserializes the message and passes it through the pipeline. 透過通道接收鏈結的結尾插入特殊分派接收伺服器通道來建立伺服器通道接收鏈結所呼叫的方法。A special dispatch sink is inserted at the end of the channel sink chain by the method, which is called by server channels to create the server channel sink chains. 當訊息到達分派接收時，分派接收會將訊息傳遞至遠端執行功能基礎結構。When the message reaches the dispatch sink, the dispatch sink passes the message to the remoting infrastructure. 下表顯示這個接收器可以針對目前的接收提供者指定的組態屬性。The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式器是否將包含版本資訊。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值`true`或`false`。Values `true` or `false`.| |`strictBinding`|指示接收格式器將會先嘗試使用完整的版本資訊 (如果有的話) 來辨識型別，然後才會使用不含版本資訊的型別名稱和組件名稱。Indicates that a receiving formatter will first try to identify the type using complete version information if it exists before using only the type name and assembly name without version information. 值`true`或`false`。Values `true` or `false`. 系統提供的兩個格式子預設都是 `false`。The default for both system-provided formatters is `false`.| |`typeFilterLevel`|字串值，指定伺服器通道嘗試執行自動還原序列化 (Deserialization) 的層級。A string value that specifies the level of automatic deserialization that a server channel attempts. 支援的值為`Low`（預設值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 如需有關還原序列化層級的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For details about deserialization levels, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).

只能由.NET Framework 1.1 版下列平台支援這個屬性： Windows 98、 Windows NT 4.0、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003 family.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此物件的執行個體，不受信任的資料或透過不安全的通道是安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 僅使用信任的資料，並透過安全的通道，請使用此物件。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在其叫用的訊息的方法呼叫轉換為 proxy 的作業。The proxy's job is to convert a method call that is invoked on it into a message. 訊息，該實作介面，請傳遞從用戶端到伺服器端叫用訊息接收物件。The message, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 訊息接收鏈結在一起，這表示每個訊息接收會負責呼叫上目前的訊息接收完成其工作之後的下一個訊息接收。Message sinks are chained together, which means that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after the current message sink has finished its work. 比方說，同步處理相關訊息接收可能會造成鎖定，以取得或釋放及委派給下游訊息接收。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink might cause a lock to be acquired or released and delegated to the downstream message sink. 格式器通道接收時取得一個訊息，需要透過管道傳送，它會呼叫，將訊息傳遞做為參數。When the formatter channel sink gets a message that needs to be sent over the channel, it calls , passing the message as a parameter. 呼叫與傳輸標頭陣列，接著會建立格式器接收格式器接收上。The formatter sink then creates the transport header array and calls on the formatter sink. 此呼叫接收鏈結中向下轉送，而且任何接收可以建立將會傳回給格式器接收的要求資料流。This call is forwarded down the sink chain, and any sink can create a request stream that will be passed back to the formatter sink. 在此之後呼叫傳回時，序列化訊息，接收鏈結中的第一個鏈結上呼叫，並將訊息傳遞給通道接收。After this call returns, the message is serialized, is called on the first chain in the sink chain, and the message is passed to the channel sinks. 通道接收之後收到訊息，寫入資料流資料、 將標頭加入至標頭陣列，便能將本身新增至接收堆疊中，然後再將轉送至下一個接收呼叫。After the channel sinks get the message, they can write data to the stream, add headers to the header array, and add themselves to the sink stack before forwarding the call to the next sink. 當呼叫到達傳輸接收鏈結的結尾時，傳輸接收會傳送標頭，並序列化訊息到伺服器，其中相反的程序在通道上。When the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain, the transport sink sends the headers and serialized message over the channel to the server, where the process is reversed. 當訊息到達伺服器端時，傳輸接收會擷取標頭和序列化資料流中的訊息並透過轉送這些接收鏈結格式器接收為止。When the message gets to the server side, the transport sink retrieves the headers and serialized message from the stream and forwards these through the sink chain until the formatter sink is reached. 格式器接收然後還原序列化訊息，並將它轉送到遠端基礎結構。The formatter sink then deserializes the message and forwards it to the remoting infrastructure. 遠端執行功能基礎結構會將訊息轉換成方法呼叫，然後呼叫 server 物件。Then, the remoting infrastructure turns the message into a method call, and calls the server object.

summary.span: 取得或設定 所執行之自動還原序列化的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of automatic deserialization that the performs.

value.span: ，表示目前的自動還原序列化層級。

span.span: The that represents the current automatic deserialization level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的值為`Low`（預設值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 如需有關還原序列化層級的詳細資訊，請參閱[自動還原序列化.NET 遠端處理中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).
